snippet: A man was arrested on Monday after more than 100 shots were fired into rock formations at the Garden of the Gods in Colorado Springs.
lead_paragraph: A man was arrested on Monday after more than 100 shots were fired into rock formations at the Garden of the Gods in Colorado Springs.

headline.main: Colorado: Man Accused of Firing at Rock Formations
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Man Accused of Firing at Rock Formations
